That's why I joined with my Senate colleagues to pass into law the Inflation Reduction Act - and I want to make sure you, your family and friends know about several of the law's provisions that went into effect January 1, 2023, which are lowering health care and prescription drug costs: · Insulin now costs no more than $35 a month for seniors on Medicare. · All vaccines approved under Medicare Part D are free.
